NeatGenomeAssertions
internal static
NeatGenomeAssertions​<T>
where T : struct

Static methods for validating/verifying the data associated with a NEAT genome.  Principally for use in debug builds and debugging sessions.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.

Functions
AssertNodeCounts
private static void AssertNodeCounts(
MetaNeatGenome<T> metaNeatGenome,
int[] hiddenNodeIdArr,
INodeIdMap nodeIndexByIdMap,
DirectedGraph digraph
)

Validate/verify the data associated with a NEAT genome, applying a series of debug asserts.

Parameters
metaNeatGenome
MetaNeatGenome<T>

Genome metadata.

id

Genome ID.

birthGeneration

Genome birth generation.

Connection genes data structure.

hiddenNodeIdArr
int[]

An array of the genome's hidden node IDs.

nodeIndexByIdMap
INodeIdMap

Mapping function for obtaining a node index for a given node ID.

digraph
DirectedGraph

The directed graph that the current genome represents.

connectionIndexMap

A set of connection index mappings.
